饒.definition: rich; abundant; exuberant; to add for free; to throw in as bonus; to spare; to forgive; despite; although

饒富.definition: to be rich in (some quality or other)

饒平.definition: Raoping county in Chaozhou 潮州[Chao2 zhou1], Guangdong

饒平縣.definition: Raoping county in Chaozhou 潮州[Chao2 zhou1], Guangdong

饒恕.definition: to forgive; to pardon; to spare

饒有風趣.definition: bubbling with humor (idiom); witty and interesting

饒河.definition: Raohe county in Shuangyashan 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

饒河縣.definition: Raohe county in Shuangyashan 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

饒舌.definition: talkative; to blather; to shoot one's mouth off; rap (genre of music)

饒舌調唇.definition: blabbing and showing off (idiom); loud-mouthed trouble maker

饒過.definition: to pardon; to excuse; to forgive

饒陽.definition: Raoyang county in Hengshui 衡水[Heng2 shui3], Hebei

饒陽縣.definition: Raoyang county in Hengshui 衡水[Heng2 shui3], Hebei
